posts.body:
>>6b64e43c-9239-40c7-a322-3361bc977c5f
Get a good vpn like Express, PIA, Nord, and use it with Tor if you're paranoid and you won't get busted if you stumble on or seed CP

>>5f6e9cf8-1c5b-4be3-96b9-5c50fdd31589
People usually get busted for CP when they get caught by another person usually a family member, stranger, or friend. Stumbling on it your first is not going to attract the attention of your ISP what will is if you keep going at it without a VPN and/or Tor.

Cases involving Tor are rare, and even moreso with VPNs. 

With Tor there is a small chance to get busted if you visit hidden services without disabling javascript due to scripts that can deanonymize your exit node. Using Tor in a workplace is also an easy way to get in trouble since the computers themselves are monitored. Zeronet has no scripts since its decentralized.

For vpns, Pure VPN was one of the few rare cases where someone with a vpn got busted but their rep was already bad to begin with and tanked with that.

The need for Zero ID killed it for normies who can't be bothered with creating one to post on here. Also most surface 8channers did not use a VPN or Tor Browser cause they didn't care if their ISP knew everything they did.

>>fbafca37-ccb2-47d8-8338-d8efad1cfad6
Assuming they managed to get Acid's private keys think the chance of that happening is very remote unlikely to happen.

Doubt this website is priority for the feds.
